page.title: 03RECREATION
page.content: We have a Youth Club in the village on Thursday nights from 7 p.m. until lO p.m. at night but I usually go home at lO.3O with Emma because her Mum is Secretary and her Dad is the Chairman. At the Youth Club we play snooker, pool, table tennis and darts. Terri Elsom is one of the players in our group. We play other things like "girl's world" for the girls to play with but me and my friends always sit by the tape recorder and sing to it. In the Community Centre we have disco's and sometimes film shows. The Community Centre is fairly new. It used to be a wooden building called Jubilee Hall. Our school used to have plays there because we hadn't got a hall of our own. Children playing nearly set fire to the old building during the last War our teacher said.
